pullrequest.title: Access the original parsed version of an SDF document with `Element::OriginalVersion`

content.raw:
I think I have addressed this concern:

* 1e44abe: `Element::ClearElements` now clears original version and file path as well
* 13f1dde: added `SDF::Clear` that calls `ClearElements` on its `Root()` and clears the `SDFPtr`'s original version and file path
* 06fa0e4: added a modified version of your test that calls `sdf->Clear()` instead of `sdf->Root()->ClearElements()`
content.html:
I think I have addressed this concern:

  • 1e44abe: Element::ClearElements now clears original version and file path as well
  • 13f1dde: added SDF::Clear that calls ClearElements on its Root() and clears the SDFPtr's original version and file path
  • 06fa0e4: added a modified version of your test that calls sdf->Clear() instead of sdf->Root()->ClearElements()
